title: My game is crashing at start of loading screen
body: 3 games in row LoL i crashing at start of leading screen all time and i try to do 3 times repair and i got CD on que for 20min and i steal weit 20 min and still game crash at start of leading screen when patch 6.19 come live any help what to do and i send bugreport and still no report

replies.body: Bugsplatting during the loading screen can be due to outdated drivers, bad game files, or something else entirely failing to render the game.  I recommend that you go over every step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help fix this up.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) for some automated fixes for some of the steps in that guide.  Let me know if you have any questions!
